text: ohu venuven puvaru vala sǣma deyakma livvemu. eya upadesak hā sǣma deyakma vigraha karannak vaśayen viya. ebævin eya balavat lesa grahaṇaya kara ganu. emenma ehi alaṁkāra dǣ grahaṇaya kara gannā men num̆bē janayāṭa da num̆ba niyōga karanu. pāpatarayingē nivahana mama num̆balāṭa penvami (yæyi ohu pævasuvēya)
